column4: I'm thinking about using this method ( https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Installation/FromKnoppix ) to install Ubuntu on another partition while I'm using Gentoo.  Is there any meta-package that I can install after the base-system to get the same packages I would if I had installed from a CD?
sorry, I don't go that way :P
or kubuntu-desktop if you want the KDE ubuntu
